com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.standalonemojos

Class MonkeyRunnerMojo.AndroidTestRunListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.standalonemojos.MonkeyRunnerMojo.AndroidTestRunListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.android.ddmlib.testrunner.ITestRunListener
    Enclosing class:
    MonkeyRunnerMojo

    public class MonkeyRunnerMojo.AndroidTestRunListener
extends Object
implements com.android.ddmlib.testrunner.ITestRunListener
    AndroidTestRunListener produces a nice output for the log for the test run as well as an xml file compatible with the junit xml report file format understood by many tools.

    It will do so for each device/emulator the tests run on.

    • Nested Class Summary
